message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: public void deleteProduct(int productId) throws ProductNotFoundException {
    Iterator<Product> it = allProducts.iterator();
    while(it.hasNext()){
        Product p = it.next();
        if (p.getId() == productId){
            it.remove();
            System.out.println("Successfully removed the product " + productId);
            return;
        }
    }
    throw new ProductNotFoundException("No Such Product");
}
<<<explanation>>>: Instead of using the indexOf method to find the index of the product in the ArrayList, you can directly remove the product using the iterator's remove method. This will optimize the code and remove the product from the ArrayList.
